content.description:
Entrance Slab is actually 2-3 miles east of Monitor Rock.  From Twin Lakes, drive about 1/2 mile west on Hwy 82.  Just past a new house being built on the right (as of July, 2002) is a sweeping right turn.  Turn off right on a narrow dirt road just after going around this bend.  It's right at mile marker 77.  See Aspen climbing guides' website for more detailed access beta and a map.(

aspenclimbingguides.com/fav…

).  The slab is right off the dirt road, 20 yards from the highway, on the right.  Park 100 yards up the road.

Entrance Slab Right is a 4 bolt route, good for teaching beginners to lead on.  A nice slab route to chains anchor.  TR the arete to the right for another nice 5.6.  Or solo it - it's not that hard.

Entrance Slab is actually 2-3 miles east of Monitor Rock.  From Twin Lakes, drive about 1/2 mile west on Hwy 82.  Just past a new house being built on the right (as of July, 2002) is a sweeping right turn.  Turn off right on a narrow dirt road just after going around this bend.  It's right at mile marker 77.  See Aspen climbing guides' website for more detailed access beta and a map.(

aspenclimbingguides.com/fav…

).  The slab is right off the dirt road, 20 yards from the highway, on the right.  Park 100 yards up the road.

Entrance Slab Left is a 4 bolt route, good for teaching beginners to lead on.  Blocky slab route to chains anchor.
